ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Engagement', ISCHANGED( Stage__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Stage__c) , 'Identify'), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Engage') ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , 'Closed') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to the next stage which is Engage or mark the Opportunity as Closed.
